title: Understanding Correlation
text: Correlation measures the relationship between two variables.

title: Visualizing Relationships
text: A good visualization for correlation shows how one variable changes with another.

title: Data Points Representation
text: The best visualization for correlation uses individual data points to represent values.

title: Axes and Variables
text: This visualization type typically has two axes, each representing one of the variables.

title: Pattern Recognition
text: The visualization allows for easy identification of patterns or trends between the variables.
